title: Bio-Oil Skincare Body Oil, Serum for Scars and Stretchmarks, Face and Body Moisturizer Dry Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E, 4.2 oz
description: Take care of your skin with Bio-Oil Skincare Oil. Made for all skin types, this skincare oil can be used to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks, scars, and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy, and more. Its fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores. It helps the skin to retain essential moisture to soften skin and provide dry skin relief. It's truly a multiuse oil that's recommended by skin care specialists. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.
